SELECT p.id, p.piRunID, idpPep.groupID FROM msProteinInferPeptide as p, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as protMatch, IDPickerPeptide as idpPep WHERE p.id = protMatch.piPeptideID AND protMatch.piPeptideID = #id# AND p.id = idpPep.piPeptideID

SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein prot, msProteinInferPeptide as pep, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as match, IDPickerPeptide as idpPep WHERE prot.piRunID=#id# AND prot.id = match.piProteinID AND match.piPeptideID = pep.id AND pep.id = idpPep.piPeptideID
